item.title: Media
item.description: A collection of external media posts that discuss projects that Sarah is involved in or that have interviewed Sarah directly (in reverse chronological order). Society of Research Sofware Engineering: Career Case Study Mouse vs Python: PyDev of the Week The Turing Podcast, Episode #15 - Reproducible Data Science: How hard can it be? CogX 2020 Tools, Practices, and Systems panel Software Sustainability Institute Fellowship 2020 announcement and profile “Make code accessible with these cloud services” Nature 575, 247-248 (2019) Interview with Ines Juvan-Beaulieu for the Exploring New Worlds blog Impact Story about The Turing Way project by The Alan Turing Institute “BinderHub is out of beta!
